extracted_information: The web content provides detailed information on ClaimWizard's features, workflow automation capabilities, and security aspects. It explicitly mentions a pricing page but does not contain specific pricing details or subscription models. Information regarding data migration tools and direct integrations is not found.

pricing.details: A link to a pricing page (https://claimwizard.com/pricing/) is present in the navigation, but no pricing plans or specific costs are detailed within the content provided.

items: Workflow Solution for Public Adjusting Firms
Claim Workflow Solution for Growing Public Adjusting Companies
Comprehensive solutions to streamline the entire claims process from initial intake to final settlement
User-friendly forms, robust assessment tools, and comprehensive documentation for smoother claim resolutions
Adapts to unique workflow, not the other way around
Unprecedented flexibility in managing, tracking, and processing claims
Custom document templates
Configurable dashboards and reporting tools
Personalized client communication portals
Flexible task management and assignment systems
Grows seamlessly with business (from dozens to thousands of claims, individuals to teams of 150+)
Unlimited claim capacity with consistent performance
Automated workflow scaling
Multi-team collaboration tools
Advanced batch processing capabilities
Operational control for growing and scaling firms
Intelligent automation to transform claims processing from hours to minutes
Reduces time spent on administrative tasks
Streamlines document retrieval
Automates follow-ups
Centralizes communication
Instant document retrieval and organization
Automated client updates and reminders
Smart task prioritization
Real-time collaboration tools
Automate workflow: Create, Assign, and Track Tasks with Custom Deadlines and Monitoring
Automated Alerts and Intelligent Task Tracking to prevent missing deadlines
Intelligent Auto-fill Templates for creating custom documents quickly
Combines deep business process optimization expertise with specialized claims management technology
Result of extensive collaboration with industry professionals and workflow experts
Industry-specific compliance tools
Built-in claims processing best practices
Specialized reporting and analytics
Claims-focused communication templates
Claim Settlement Tracking to turn financial complexity into clear profit
Powerful Analytics and Professional Reporting to showcase success
Intelligent Task Management & Performance Tracking for team empowerment
Transform scattered documents into an organized, searchable digital system
Profit protection tools that catch lost revenue
Audit trails for E&O risk reduction
Real-time visibility across the firm
Accountability systems to manage staff and claims
